title: Chapter 272: Akatsuki
body:
Chapter 272: Akatsuki

Chapter 272: Akatsuki


In the sky, Bu Feng was streaking across rapidly towards the south just like a huge meteor.


“Little Feng, why were you so anxious to leave? That person was our benefactor, but you flounced out like this, wasn’t that very rude?” In the midair, Fang Qian who was tightly holding the shoulder of Bu Feng curiously asked.


“Qian’er, you don’t know the reason, that fellow saved us with bad intention.” Bu Feng answered while shaking his head.


“Why are you saying that?” Hearing the words of Bu Feng, Fang Qian felt somewhat odd and asked again.


“I’ll explain to you after we get to a safe location,” Bu Feng shook his head. Although Ren Tianyou had not followed them, but he still didn’t dare to be careless.


“Fine!” Fang Qian nodded her head and no longer asked another question. They were together since childhood, experienced trials and tribulations together for many years, and had a complete trust in each other, so she didn’t ask any question again.


After rapidly flying for nearly an hour, they arrived to a nameless mountain top. After that Bu Feng and Fang Qian slowly descended from the sky.


After finding a place to sit down, Bu Feng narrated from the beginning about the matter of him trying to assassinate the members of Akatsuki organization, then him being chased by Ren Tianyou, furthermore Ren Tianyou inviting him to join his organization just a moment ago.


“So I urgently take you away for there. Moreover the strength of that fellow is unfathomable, even if we two combined our strength to fight against him, we are definitely not a match for him. So it was best for us to quickly leave that place.” Bu Feng sat beside Fang Qian and slowly explained to her.


“So it was like that.” Fang Qian nodded her head. Then looking at Bu Feng’s that a little bit tired face, she reached out her hard and gently caressed his face, while softly saying, “Little Feng, these past few years were really painful for you.”


“Hehe, its fine Qian’er. Now all our bitterness ends and the sweetness begins. Form this day forth, I want to accompany you to walk around every nook and corner of this Divine Wind Continent.” Bu Feng placed his hand on the face of Fang Qian, and gently said.


“You two are quite affectionate, but I will be disturbing you two this time.” At this time, a voice suddenly resounded, interrupting Bu Feng and Fang Qian’s touching conversation.


“Who?” Hearing the sudden voice, Bu Feng and Fang Qian immediately reacted. They instantly jumped up from the rock they were sitting, then Bu Feng took out his dagger from his waist and Fang Qian also took out magic wand with was glimmering with pure white holy light, afterwards looked all around.


After that they immediately saw Ren Tianyou not far away in their left side, who was standing while folding his arms in front of his chest and looking at them with a smile on his face.


“You? How can this be? How can you be here, I should have already shook you off from my tail.” Seeing Ren Tianyou, the face of Bu Feng was filled with disbelief, and he asked Ren Tianyou in surprise.


“Do you think you are able to run past my control? You can’t run away from me.” Ren Tianyou answered with a smile on his face.


“You……!” Seeing that evil smile on the face of Ren Tianyou, Bu Feng immediately breathe heavily, and he didn’t know what to say. But at this moment, he suddenly recalled how Ren Tianyou had instantly taken both him and Fang Qian several thousand meters away from Light Temple. “You can actually use space magic.”


“Yes, I can indeed use space magic. Now you know this, you should be clear that no matter what, you two can’t escape from my control.” Ren Tianyou didn’t deny, because everyone in the continent already knew the matter of him being able to use space magic, so there was nothing good to conceal it.


“Damn it, this fellow can really use space magic, what should I do now, even if my speed is very fast, it is not comparable to space teleportation.” This moment, Bu Feng continuously thought countermeasures, but there was no effective method.


And currently those beautiful eyes of Fang Qian were filled with shock, she had never thought that this young man before her eyes was actually able to use mysterious space magic. As a Holy Maiden of Light Temple, she was clear about the strength of space magic.


“What do you think, want to continue playing? I will not use space magic, but if I am able to stop both of you from leaving, then you must join, and if I am not able to prevent, then I will naturally not bother you both again.” Seeing the unwilling face of Bu Feng, Ren Tianyou slowly said with a smile.


“You really mean what you say?” Hearing Ren Tianyou, Bu Feng suddenly saw a hope. He immediately looked towards Ren Tianyou, and conformed. Bu Feng was completely confident that no one was able to stop him, if space magic was not used.


“Yes, although I, Zero am not a good person, but I never go back on my words.” Ren Tianyou answered with a slight smile. But Bu Feng and Fang Qian didn’t notice the scheme behind this slight smile of Ren Tianyou.


“Okay, if it is like that, then I will agree to it.” Bu Feng nodded his head while agreeing to the condition of Ren Tianyou. After that walked towards the side of Fang Qian, and said in a low voice, “Qian’er, firmly hold onto me.”


“Okay, Little Feng.” Fang Qian nodded her head, and tightly held the right hand of Bu Feng.


“Then I will countdown, after I count to one from three, we will begin to move at that time.” Ren Tianyou said to Bu Feng.


“Okay, I’m ready, you can begin the countdown.” Bu Feng nodded his head, then slightly separated his legs, and released a dim starlight from his body.


“Then I will begin the countdown.” Finished speaking, he placed his hand together, and circulated the chakra within his body, while his Sharingan firmly stared both of them.


“3!”


“2!”


“1!”


After Ren Tianyou began to countdown, the dim starlight around the body of Bu Feng glimmered even more violently. When the countdown reached “1”, Bu Feng instantly jumped to fly in the sky taking Fang Qian with him, but while he was fast, but Ren Tianyouw as even faster.


“Although I can’t use space ninjutsu, but I can still use time ninjutsu. You will never understand my means.” Ren Tianyou realistically thought within his heart, while the pattern in his left eye spun rapidly pouring out a huge amount of eye power. “Doujutsu—-Forever Solidity!”


Along with the voice of Ren Tianyou, the surrounding time and space instantly froze, including Bu Feng and Fang Qian. Currently Both Bu Feng and Fang Qian were maintaining liftoff posture little above the ground, which looked very weird.


“Can’t waste time.” Ren Tianyou clearly understood that using his Forever Solidity in such far distance, it would only be able to stop time for three seconds at most, so he quickly began to make a series of hand seals, “Mokuton—-Jukai Kotan! (Wood Style—-Deep Forest Emergence!)”


Along with the voice of Ren Tianyou, the ground suddenly ruptured in succession and began to shake violently, then instantly countless huge trees directly grew out from the ground.


And at this time, Bu Feng and Fang Qian who were frozen in the sky due to the effect of Forever Solidity had already recovered. But right now even though they were awake, they were helpless, as the surroundings around them had already changed into huge forest, and countless sturdy vines were already advancing towards them in high speed.


And even with the speed of Bu Feng, confronting against those countless vines attacking indiscriminatingly, he didn’t have any method. Very soon, both of them were firmly tied up by the vines.


“What do you think, this time I didn’t use space magic.” At that time, Ren Tianyou landed on the branch of a tree, then said to Bu Feng.


“I miscalculated, never though that in addition to space magic, you actually possessed such powerful nature magic. I, Bu Feng admit my defeat, and as I said before, I will join your organization.” Right now Bu Feng was already firmly tied up with countless vines, and if Ren Tianyou wanted, then he would have already died long ago. So looking at the suddenly appeared Ren Tianyou, he said while being a little bit dejected.


“Dismiss!” Ren Tianyou made a hand seal, and released both Bu Feng and Fang Qian. After that he jumped towards them, and said to both of them, “Actually you don’t need to be so pessimistic, my organization is different from other forces, and there is not any big restriction on the members of Akatsuki.”


“Including you two, there is only ten members within my organization. Furthermore hereafter there will be only these ten member, will not increase again. Usually you are free without any restriction. Other than the time period of mission, you can freely do anything you want.”


“And we Akatsuki organization and other organizations are different. Our objective is not to struggle to dominate the continent, but to support each other and improve our strength, so that all of can reach the pinnacle of this world’s strength.”


“But once someone provoke us, we will also not be afraid to retaliate. Such as former Ximen clan and Magic Domain.”


“But our organization have two requirements that must be abide. First, never betray the organization. You must never tell the secrets of our organization to any outsiders including your closest person. Violators will be killed.”


“Second, once the other member of our organization is in danger, everyone must spare no effort to come and save them. No one is allowed to not try to save them when they are in mortal danger. Violator will be killed.”


Ren Tianyou explained the rule of Akatsuki organization to both of them. After hearing the explanation of Ren Tianyou, both of them slightly relaxed. Then Bu Feng said with a smile, “I thought your organization was also same as other organization who would do everything for the sake of their benefit. But it seems I have understood mistakenly.”


“If your organization is really like what you have said, then I will definitely be serious to do what I need to do.”


“The members within our organization use code name. My original name is Ren Tianyou, but organization name is Zero. There is White Tiger who is Holy Sword clan’s Li Jianrong. He is Peak Mid God realm expert.”


“Void is Death clan’s Yan Xinluo, also Peak Mid God realm expert.”


“Jade Maiden is former disciple of Illusory Shrine’s one of the holy envoy Li Xinyun, is finest illusionist expert as well as Peak Low God realm expert.”


“Vermilion Bird is Feng Wu, daughter of Flame Phoenix Villa’s Villa Mistress, is Mid God realm expert.”


“Great Bear is Di Qingyu, nephew of Flame Phoenix Villa’s Villa Mistress, and possess mutated blood lineage ‘Great Sun Heavenly Phoenix’, is Peak Mid God realm expert.”


“Santai is my wife Wang Yuxin, is Low God realm expert, and also an Earth Magician.”


“Black Tortoise is my elder sister Ren Muyue, as for her strength you will know later.”


“And now I will give Southern Dipper codename to you Bu Feng, and Azure Dragon for your little sweetheart Fang Qian.” After introducing all the members of Akatsuki to Bu Feng and Fang Qian, Ren Tianyou took out two rings from his space ring and handed it over to them. “These two rings symbolize the identity of our organization. And there is additional great use in the future, so keep it properly.”


After that he gave the robe of Akatsuki organization to them, “This is the dress of our organization. Usually you don’t need to wear it, but during the mission of organization, you must wear it, because it symbolize the identity of our organization.”


“Okay, we got it.” Bu Feng and Fang Qian took ring and clothing, and nodded their head.


“Then I am leaving first, and I’ll also tell other members about the matters of you two joining our organization. You can also use this ring to contact them.” Ren Tianyou nodded his head, “Okay, now you two are free to do as you please, as our organization is not having any mission for the time being. Now I am leaving first, will not disturb your affection time.” Finished speaking, Ren Tianyou directly used Hiraishin no Jutsu to immediately disappear from there.


“Bastard, what affectionate time.” Hearing Ren Tianyou’s last words, Bu Feng opened mouth to curse, but after Ren Tianyou had left, Bu Feng looked at Fang Qian and said with deep love, “Qian’er, it’s been a long period of time since we last see each other, I……….”


“Little Feng!” Seeing the affectionate look of Bu Feng, Fang Qian blushed and lowered her head.


The mouth of Bu Feng approached closer and closer to the mouth of Fang Qian. But just when their lips were about to contact with each other, suddenly the voice of Ren Tianyou resounded, “Oh, that’s right, I forget to tell you how to use the ring to contact other member. Everything is written down here, now you can busy yourself.” Finished speaking, Ren Tianyou threw a scroll, then he immediately disappeared again.


“Ah…….!” Seeing the sudden appearance of Ren Tianyou, Fang Qian instantly blushed and jumped up. And as for Bu Feng, he roared in grief and indignation, “Bastard Zero, I, your father will slaughter you ah.”
